attributes.action: Make pharmaceutical companies liable for injuries caused by all their vaccines.
attributes.additional_details: Make pharmaceutical companies to be held personally responsible for their vaccines instead of a vaccine injury fund which is hard to access and payment of £120,000 is not enough to support someone with a life long injury ,as it also stops people attaining disability benefits.
attributes.background: Pharmaceutical companies are not liable for their vaccines if they cause injury and death. They have a record of scientific fraud and have been sued millions for their drugs, which they are liable for. So why are they protected with their vaccines?.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593565
